title: Shanghai to Lock Down 25 Million People, Half of the City at a Time
sub_head: Decision comes day after officials denied Covid-19 lockdown plans, amid a rise in mostly asymptomatic cases
body:
Shanghai imposed stringent pandemic restrictions it has long tried to avoid on its 25 million residents that are likely to disrupt commercial activity well beyond the city limits.
Local authorities said on Sunday they plan to lock down the city in two phases over the next week to try to control an outbreak of the highly infectious Omicron variant of the Covid-19 virus.
